post.description:
Get access token for user using JSON data.
Accepts either email or username as the identifier.

get.description:
Verify access token and return user information if valid.
This endpoint is used by client applications to check if a token is still valid.

Get history for all devices.
Returns an empty array if no history is found.

schema.title: Response Read All Device History Api V1 Devices History Get

get.description: Retrieve devices owned by the current user.

schema.title: Response Read Devices Api V1 Devices  Get

post.description: Create new device owned by the current user.

get.description: Get device by ID.

put.description: Update the labels assigned to a device.

get.description: Get all labels assigned to a specific device.

schema.title: Response Read Device Labels Api V1 Devices  Device Id  Labels Get

get.description:
Get history for a specific device.
Returns an empty array if no history is found.

schema.title: Response Read Device History Api V1 Devices  Device Id  History Get

get.description: Retrieve labels owned by the current user.

schema.title: Response Read Labels Api V1 Labels  Get

post.description: Create new label owned by the current user.

get.description: Get label by ID.
Get all devices assigned to a specific label.

schema.title: Response Read Label Devices Api V1 Labels  Label Id  Devices Get

get.description:
Get history for all labels owned by the current user. Can be filtered by flow_id.
Returns an empty array if no history is found.

Parameters:
    flow_id: Optional flow ID to filter by

schema.title: Response Read All Label History Api V1 Labels History Get

get.description:
Get history for a specific label owned by the current user. Can be filtered by flow_id.
Returns an empty array if no history is found.

Parameters:
    flow_id: Optional flow ID to filter by

schema.title: Response Read Label History Api V1 Labels  Label Id  History Get

get.description: Get a specific label history entry by ID.
Retrieve integrations owned by the current user.

schema.title: Response Read Integrations Api V1 Integrations  Get

post.description: Create new integration owned by the current user.

get.description: Get integration by ID.

Get history for all integrations owned by the current user.
Returns an empty array if no history is found.

schema.title: Response Read All Integration History Api V1 Integrations History Get

get.description:
Get history for a specific integration.
Returns an empty array if no history is found.

schema.title: Response Read Integration History Api V1 Integrations  Integration Id  History Get

get.description: Get a specific integration history entry by ID.
Retrieve functions owned by the current user.

schema.title: Response Read Functions Api V1 Functions  Get

Get history for all functions owned by the current user.
Returns an empty array if no history is found.

get.description:
Get history for a specific function.
Returns an empty array if no history is found.

schema.title: Response Read Function History Api V1 Functions  Function Id  History Get

get.description: Get a specific function history entry by ID.
Retrieve flows owned by the current user.

schema.title: Response Read Flows Api V1 Flows  Get

Get history for a specific flow.
Returns an empty array if no history is found.

Retrieve storage configurations owned by the current user.

post.description:
Receive uplink data from ChirpStack and process it.

Authentication:
    Requires a valid API key in the X-API-Key header

schema.title: Response Receive Chirpstack Uplink Api V1 Ingest Chirpstack Post

get.description:
Search across different resources (devices, functions, flows, integrations).

You can optionally limit the search to specific resource types.

Authentication:
    Requires a valid JWT token

parameters.name: resource_types

schema.description: Comma-separated list of resource types to search (devices, functions, flows, integrations). If not provided, searches all types.
schema.title: Resource Types

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of resource types to search (devices, functions, flows, integrations). If not provided, searches all types.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of results per resource type
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of results per resource type

schema.title: Response Search Resources Api V1 Search  Get

expected_transmit_time.title: Expected Transmit Time
expected_transmit_time.description: Expected transmit time in minutes, between 1 minute and 24 hours (1-1440)
